          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Fossils buried in layers of sediments</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fossilien begraben in den Schichten Sedimenten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fossiles enterrés dans les couches de 
sédiments</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fossils enterrados nas camadas de sedimentos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fossili sepolti negli strati dei sedimenti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απολιθώματα που θάβονται στα στρώματα των ιζημάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fósiles enterrados en capas de sedimentos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that fossils buried in layers of sediment are evidence of plant and animal remains that have been trapped in rocks.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dead plants</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fossils</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">igneous rocks</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">remains</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sedimentary rocks</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sediments</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß die Fossilien, die in
den Schichten Sediment begraben werden, Beweis von Betriebs- und Tier 
Remains sind, die in den Felsen eingeschlossen worden sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que les fossiles 
enterrés dans les couches de sédiment sont évidence des restes 
d'usine et d'animal qui ont été emprisonnées dans les roches.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que os fossils 
enterrados nas camadas de sedimento são evidência do remains da 
planta e do animal que foram prendidas nas rochas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che i fossili sepolti
negli strati di sedimento sono prova del remains dell'animale e della 
pianta che sono stati bloccati in roccie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι τα απολιθώματα που 
θάβονται στα στρώματα του ιζήματος είναι στοιχεία των 
εγκαταστάσεων και το ζώο παραμένει που έχει παγιδευτεί στους 
βράχους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que los fósiles 
enterrados en las capas de sedimento son evidencia del restos de la 
planta y del animal que se han atrapado en rocas.</string>
          </description>
